title: What Does a Black Evil Eye Represent?

steps.title: The black evil eye is a symbol that protects you from negativity.
steps.content: The black evil eye is a symbol that protects you from negativity. All evil eyes shield you from the negative energy people send your way, but the black evil eye in particular can absorb negativities and turn them into something positive. Wearing one can give you a renewed sense of hope and strength. The black evil eye can also ward off jealousy by making the jealous person direct their gaze somewhere else. [1] X Research source This belief is held across a variety of cultures, including many Middle Eastern, Mediterranean, and Indian societies. The symbol we know as the evil eye actually protects you from the true evil eye , which is the look someone gives you when they wish negativity or harm toward you. [2] X Research source

steps.title: The black evil eye can help you let go of trauma and mourning.
steps.content: The black evil eye can help you let go of trauma and mourning. The color black is often associated with death, so wearing a black evil eye can help absorb any negative energy associated with past traumas or grief and give you the strength to move on. [3] X Research source

steps.title: A black evil eye provides clarity and insight during times of uncertainty.
steps.content: A black evil eye provides clarity and insight during times of uncertainty. If you’re in an unclear situation and are unsure how to move forward, wearing a black evil eye can help dispel any spiritual or mental fog. It allows you to see things for what they truly are and make the best decision for the situation.

steps.title: The black evil eye symbol encourages self-discovery.
steps.content: The black evil eye symbol encourages self-discovery. The evil eye is sometimes interpreted as a divine message of encouragement. Wearing a black evil eye allows you to awaken your curiosity and look deep within yourself to discover who you are and what you want in life. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Wear the evil eye symbol as jewelry.
steps.content: Wear the evil eye symbol as jewelry. The most common way to use the evil eye is to wear it on your person. Evil eyes are often worn as bracelets , though they can also be depicted in necklaces, rings, and earrings. [5] X Research source While evil eyes have come into popular fashion, remember that they are an important part of many cultures and make sure that you’re wearing them respectfully. Know what evil eyes mean and what they represent, and wear them because of their meaning and not just because they look cool.

steps.title: Hang black evil eye decor in your home.
steps.content: Hang black evil eye decor in your home. Evil eyes are most commonly hung in entryways to protect your household from negativity. You can also place it in a window, on your doormat, or anywhere else that is easily visible. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Hold the evil eye during meditation.
steps.content: Hold the evil eye during meditation. Using a black evil eye during meditation helps you develop spiritual insight and promotes healing. Hold it in your hand or place it on your third eye chakra. This is also a common way of recharging an evil eye. While meditating , envision the evil eye filling up with healing light. Your intention alone will recharge it. This will help clear the evil eye of any lingering negative energy so it can continue protecting you. You can also use a black evil eye during Reiki healing. Like meditation, when you practice Reiki , holding a black evil eye helps you focus your energy and protects you from negativity.

steps.title: The black evil eye helps balance the root chakra.
steps.content: The black evil eye helps balance the root chakra. The root chakra represents stability and security. [7] X Research source Since the black evil eye can turn negative energy into positive, it can be used in chakra work to help balance the root chakra and boost self-confidence and stability.

steps.title: In astrology, the black evil eye is associated with Pluto and Scorpio.
steps.content: In astrology, the black evil eye is associated with Pluto and Scorpio. The color black represents the hidden and the unknown in astrology, so it is often linked to the planet Pluto and its ruling sign Scorpio. [8] X Research source If you have strong Scorpio or Pluto placements in your birth chart, a black evil eye may be particularly potent for you.

steps.title: Black evil eyes sometimes feature a secondary color.
steps.content: Black evil eyes sometimes feature a secondary color. If your evil eye has another color like white or blue, it gains additional meanings associated with those colors. [9] X Research source Here is a list of common evil eye colors and what they mean: Blue: peace, tranquility, wisdom, protection, patience White: truth, healing, peace, cleansing, renewal, unity Red: strength, courage, passion, confidence, energy Green: luck, prosperity, fertility, growth, nature Yellow: confidence, charm, beauty, abundance, intelligence Purple: intuition, divination, creativity, meditation, spiritual enlightenment Pink: love, friendship, compassion, kindness, happiness Orange: positive energy, justice, creativity, flexibility, change Brown: stability, balance, grounding, animals, earth magic
